full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYUNG NAG MKHA' LDING DBANG PO'I SGRUB THABS BYABS BSRUNG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES YI DAM RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS BYABS BSRUNG DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI RIGS RUS MNGON PAR MTHO BA'I BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG WANG TSE RING DBANG POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BGYIS ZHES ZER BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DGA' LDAN SHAR RTZE MKHAN PO SHI LA MING CAN RATNA DHARMA R'A DZAS DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG LAS GZHI BYAS NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
